name: Tiny Jungle Car
description:
jungle Car is an exciting,2D action jeep driving game based on real physics with fascinating graphic. It is a simple 2D, yet challenging to play.
Deal with series of barriers on impossible tracks, slide through the ramps and redefine yourself.
Prepare for a supernatural, ambient tiny car journey through the platform.
Set out on your life journey to become the most furious speed 2D Jungle racer, and be the top on the chart.
